price: Àwọn tó wà nínú àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀ ń bèèrè (n̄ǹkan) lọ́dọ̀ Rẹ̀; Ó sì wà lórí ìṣe lójoojúmọ́.
arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ كُلَّ يَوۡمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأۡنٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yasaluhu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kulla yawmin huwa fī shanin
